events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin review shortly.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as software developer and devops experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to this engineering position to coordinate the upcoming steps with the candidate.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well; their experience with software development and devops is promising.
The candidate has responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the engineering role and readiness for a technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further assess the candidate's software engineering skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and devops practices.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's fit within the company culture and confirm final steps.
The HR interview was completed positively; the candidate aligns well with company values and expectations.
We have proposed an offer to the candidate for the software engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to the software engineer role.
The onboarding process has commenced, including access setup and introduction to the engineering department.
The recruitment process is now complete and the candidate is officially hired as a software engineer on the team.
